survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with In-Office Wellness Amenities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with in-office wellness amenities provided by the company to improve workplace well-being.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of in-office wellness amenities (e.g., gym, meditation rooms, wellness programs)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels effectively.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of in-office wellness amenities (e.g., gym, meditation rooms, wellness programs)?

questions.question_text: Which in-office wellness amenities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify popular amenities for resource allocation.

script.question_text: Which in-office wellness amenities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional wellness amenities would you like to see implemented in the office?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather innovative suggestions for future wellness initiatives.

script.question_text: What additional wellness amenities would you like to see implemented in the office?

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in company-sponsored wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess engagement levels with existing wellness programs.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in company-sponsored wellness programs?

questions.question_text: Has access to in-office wellness amenities positively impacted your job satisfaction?
answer_options: No, but I haven't used them
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure the perceived value of wellness amenities on job satisfaction.

script.question_text: Has access to in-office wellness amenities positively impacted your job satisfaction?
answer_options: No, but I haven't used them
